amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director of National Intelligence to submit a report to Congress on a strategy to defeat ISIL and al-Qaeda.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 16 printed in House Report 114-155 to require the Director of National Intelligence to submit to Congress a strategy to defeat ISIL and al-Qaeda.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Poe (TX).
